title: loved this tour and caveman is wonderful in caye caulker
text: We snorkeled the all day tour with caveman tours and just loved our 2 guides and went to 7 different stops. The lunch is also really good for on the boat food...just a marvelous day and they make sure you are really safe the whole time...HIGHLY recommend this company

title: absolutely wonderful but VERY strenuous and dangerous if you are NOT in good shape. Use a good experienced guide
text: absolutely wonderful but VERY strenuous and dangerous if you are NOT in good shape. Use a good experienced guide!! We used a local tour guide named Hugh and he was amazing....HIGHLY recommend his company. I cannot remember the company name right off. The cave is the MOST beautiful thing I have maybe ever seen and we travel a LOT. You just can't go to Belize and NOT do this tour.

title: don't stay on the weekend...wild crowd of locals and they party and knock on your door ALL night but weeknights are good
text: We stayed 3 nights here....a Friday Saturday and Sunday....Friday was rowdy until around midnight because ALL the locals come that are not staying at the hotel and use the pool which is amazing and drink at the pool bar. Saturday night we were kept up ALL night long...people slammed doors, laughed loud, beat on chairs, and knocked on our door then ran probably 20 times every 10 minutes or so starting at about 1am. The property and room is very clean and nice and once again a beautiful pool with a waterfall and staff is nice but it is NOT a quiet nor family place on the weekend...lots of very sexual teens there also so not kid friendly for vacationers. We are a middle age couple traveling alone so ignored it. I would say absolutely under NO circumstances stay on a Saturday night but the other nights were better.

title: rude about check out and noisy....bathroom exhaust vent FILTHY!!!!!
text: We have stayed here many many times and always loved it...however this time felt different....maybe covid maybe not?? The exhaust vent in the bathroom was hanging with dirt and debris and absolutely filthy...carpet was dirty. Maybe cleaning LESS due to covid JUST don't KNOW?? Also we was called at 10:40 by housekeeping and asked why we had not left...I said check out isn't 11 and the lady said no it is 10am. I said okay sorry we didn't even check in Wed night until almost 8pm and she said it didn't matter. I said do you want us out this minute and she said yes leave right now...just super rude and my daughter and her husband are property owners....can't wait to tell them about this. Maybe they can get out of their time share due to the property going downhill and the staff being extra hateful and rude.....no sense in this.
place: The Wilderness Club at Big Cedar

title: sweet little waitress and always a delicious place to eat
text: I ate here 10/20/2020 alone after my husband had surgery at the orthopedic hospital...my little waitress was wonderful and the food and atmosphere was very calm and soothing. Love OG

title: Just absolutely wonderful!!!
text: My husband had a total hip replacement 10/26/20 at mercy orthopedic hospital in Ft Smith, AR and we live 2 hours away. I needed a place to lay down, sleep for the night, shower, and rest once his surgery was over. The hotel staff went above and beyond to make me feel welcome, secure, check in early to rest, and was even willing to give me a late check out (which I ended up not needing). This hotel is perfectly located, super quiet and safe, comfy beds, extra clean, and breakfast was really good with the corona restrictions going on. I would a million times stay here again and hope you do also if in the area. Thanks ladies you are beyond wonderful!!!!!!!
place: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Fort Smith

title: delicious and good prices for seafood
text: we ate here 9/19 and it was wonderful...our waitress was precious and the food was delicious..highly recommend this place

title: dirty but cheap and dogs are free
text: we stayed 1 night here and I wrote my name in the dust of the bedside table and the carpet down the halls/elevator are stained filthy....they have signs up that they are not cleaning due to corona. I would think you would clean MORE during a virus outbreak but obviously (and it IS OBVIOUS) they do NOT and are not planning to. Also at 1:30am there was people hollering, laughing, slamming doors, etc so we got about ZERO sleep...breakfast is a bottle of water, tiny container of can peaches, and nasty granola bar in a brown bag....okay for 1 night but not recommended at ALL!!!!
place: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Okc North - Quail Springs

title: a must see in memphis....super cool
text: this bass pro is a MUST SEE when going through Memphis...we really enjoyed it and got my hubby new crocks and our dogs a new collar and leash...very beautiful inside and tranquil....super unique
place: Bass Pro Shops at the Pyramid

title: great food and super service
text: we ate dinner here 6-14-2020 and enjoyed it....service was fast and good and the food was fresh and prices are always reasonable

title: nice place and reasonable prices
text: we stayed one night here on biz 6-13 to 6-14 and it is clean with a nice pool around back and breakfast was good...comfy bed and fairly quiet. There was some 6:30am door slamming and talking but that is the guest fault not the hotel right????
place: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Nashville Airport, TN

title: good but pricey
text: this was my 2nd time to graceland and it was small groups with the corona thing going on and my husband's first time...we enjoyed it. It is pretty expensive for a tour that is self guided etc but we did enjoy it.
place: Elvis Presley's Graceland Tour with Audio Guide & Airplanes

title: Do NOT stay here in DECEMBER EVER!!!! Nightmare stuff and the rudest I have ever met in my LIFE
text: Do NOT stay here in DECEMBER EVER!!!! Nightmare stuff and the rudest I have ever met in my LIFE!!!! OMG we stayed here 1 night Dec 14th 2019 and had a show at 3pm. We needed to check in about 1pm so called at noon and nobody was even there so we left a voicemail that was not returned no call back. Showed up at 1:15pm and again nobody there but the adjoining restaurant was open....called again and the phone rang behind the counter and rang bell and nothing....restaurant guy said the lady was upstairs and would come down...he finally called her and she was furious we were there. She said she doesn't mess with ozark deals and wasn't messing with me and was screaming at me. NEVER experienced anything like it and come to find out they had CLOSED DECEMBER 5th???? They had sold us a voucher so decided eh we can stay when they say we can so we checked in at 10pm after a show and slept....stained carpet and brown towels mixed with some white wash cloths...towels use to be white but was so grungy and unbleached they should have been thrown away. This place is wretched DON'T STAY!!!!! I travel a LOT even out of the country and this is one of the WORST experiences ever and way overpriced and just horrifying service and rude inn keeper hating on her job and everyone that would dare disturb her from living upstairs there.

title: loved this show
text: we saw this show 12-14-19 and so enjoyed it...the 2 young boys are incredible and the show is very tastefully done. Recommended

title: quick lunch here...delicious
text: we ate here 12-15-19 and had fish and chips and a reuben sandwich and salad and it was great..nice waitress and they had the game on...laid back relaxing atmosphere

title: beautiful place and very kind personnel....enjoyed our stay
text: beautiful place and very kind personnel....enjoyed our stay! We got in the outdoor hot tub there are 2 and a little pond/brook that runs through the property and you can hot tub until midnight which is wonderful...rooms are great and everything is very clean, modern, and check in was fast and efficient! Recommend!!!

title: nice place but $30 to airport via owner and FAR from airport but advertised 6 miles away
text: nice place but $30 to airport via owner and FAR from airport but advertised 6 miles away. We had to pay $42 euro for staying 1 night for taxes and a ride to the airport to get home to the USA. We chose this place because it said only 6 miles from the airport but that is NOT true it is far about 25 minutes and expensive to get back there via them or taxi either one....with that added in we could have stayed at the airport hotel for the same price and been so much more convenient.

title: walked this trail but part was closed
text: walked this trail but part was closed however we still walked what was open and it is simply beautiful

title: MY FAVORITE of all the places we stayed in Italy and Greece
text: MY FAVORITE of all the places we stayed in Italy and Greece! We had a room that we left the window open all night to hear the waves crashing against the rocks and it was small but beautiful, quaint, upper scale, and our owner/host was amazingly wonderful!

title: I loved this place
text: I loved this hotel...it is a little hard to find but all the hotels in venice are down alleys and it is a mouse maze...but so cool and fun. This hotel is nice and very affordable. The staff is nice and welcoming too.

title: mix up on check in and couldn't get in room until 9pm but a nice place
text: mix up on check in and couldn't get in room until 9pm but a nice place! Our owner had a art show and wasn't at the train station when we arrived but we had no phone service so was partially our fault but then forgot keys and we stood outside in the alley another half hour sort of scary but it worked out...it is a very nice place and we did enjoy her and the stay

title: so so beautiful
text: be sure and go here if you stay in Praiano and it is also fairly close to sorento and amalfi coast which is nice

title: this is a beautiful place to go
text: We got amazing pictures and walked all around here...lots of sailboats and the cliffs are gorgeous on the water

title: beautiful hotel but expensive...on the ocean though
text: beautiful hotel but expensive...on the ocean though and the breakfast is for a king!! You get fresh squeezed OJ and anything you can imagine it is there...they do charge even for a local bus ticket though and room was $200 night plus $15 euro tax for 2 nights

title: worst bed of my life...literally a piece of plywood but cheap
text: worst bed of my life...literally a piece of plywood but cheap for a sea view room and it was a beautiful ocean there and a grocery store within walking distance with a few little restaurant bars....0 sleep though

title: something neat to do while there but pricey for what you get
text: something neat to do while there but pricey for what you get. We paid $35 euro and couldn't even find the museum and they are NOT helpful in Greece...very rude and you are on your own.

title: very nice hotel especially for the price
text: we just loved it here....right by the ocean and quaint little restaurants and shopping was close and we went to a nearby tour. We had a club sandwich for $3.50 euro with fries and drank a mojito down the street from here

title: have to see it to believe it
text: this was by far my favorite thing we did in Rome and we did lots. It looks small until you get inside it is amazing gorgeous

title: loved this
text: A must while in Rome....the fountain is just so pretty and the crowd wasn't real bad in November so go then

title: not a lot to it but so historical
text: not a lot to it but so historical so recommend it while in Rome..so much to see and the street shopping is super

title: beyond beautiful
text: a must when in Rome...we visited here November 2019 and it was so beautiful...have to see it to truly appreciate.

title: we loved this little self serve bed and breakfast
text: we loved this little self serve bed and breakfast. They helped us get transportation from Rome to the airport to go to Greece....quaint and the location is amazing for you to go to the Vatican museum a MUST! and see all the sights of Rome

title: canceled us 2 weeks before our stay and many others reporting the same bologna
text: avoid at all costs...they cancel you and I think they are overbooking and taking the highest price! We got a different room and hotels.com credited us $100 for all the trouble of finding a new place to stay on such short notice

title: a great show and very moving...lots of action and live animals
text: we saw this show 9-14-19 and it was very good...the actors all knew their lines, showed emotion, and I loved the sheep, horses, mules, shooting, riding, etc....a great show in branson
place: Branson Shepherd of the Hills Outdoor Drama

title: very unorganized and slow service...lady spilled a bowl of salsa on a customer...awful
text: We ate here 9-14 and it was slower than molasses and very unorganized. When we first got there the waitress had spilled a WHOLE bowl of salsa on a customer and she was very upset...had to ask for our check and was late to our show due to slow slow service...food fair. Not recommended with so many better places to eat in branson.

title: love this place it never disappoints
text: we ate here 9-13 and it was so so good....never disappoints and I had a half price voucher that took $20 off so cost us $6 balance...amazing

title: Very clean and great breakfast
text: We stayed here for the weekend and check in was fast and the room was very clean and in good shape...breakfast is very good and we had a great time. Definitely would stay again!!! :) The room has a small fridge and microwave also

title: this was super fun and be sure and ride the horse/carriage
text: this was super fun and be sure and ride the horse/carriage! The views below the cliffs of moher are also beautiful but do the walk above with pat sweeney for the 'real" experience

title: don't bother it is $8 euro and not much to see really
text: don't bother it is $8 euro and not much to see really! There are too many real amazing castles to spend your $$$ and time on like kylemore abbey a MUST

title: beautiful...unique and free
text: this was like entering a quiet church...beautiful statues, architecture and free...a must while downtown dublin

title: fun and really interesting..a little overpriced $25 euro but popular
text: fun and really interesting..a little overpriced $25 euro but popular!! It took 2 or 3 hours and you get to draw your own guiness at the end to drink a pint which was fun

title: so fun and great Irish music
text: love this little place just had a drink but the food looked amazing and it is packed nightly but can still drink at the bar

title: live music and cute bartender men
text: Loved this little place great location in the city center middle of everything and live music every night....lots of fun and great locals

title: cute little place
text: liked this little bar only went 1 night but friendly bartender and a few other nice locals in there to visit with
place: The Cafe Bar at Glashaus Hotel

title: only place in 10 days I had a bathtub...easy access to tram and big mall with grocreries across street
text: only place in 10 days I had a bathtub...easy access to tram and big mall with groceries across street! I stayed 2 nights and loved this place and a cute little bar inside and super sweet staff here. Highly recommend

title: amazing beautiful
text: so beautiful and a spiritual feeling walking i...the old architecture is something to behold and so worth taking a look

title: If you don't do this tour you MISSED it while in Ireland...most beautiful I have ever seen by far and travel lots
text: If you don't do this tour you MISSED it while in Ireland...most beautiful I have ever seen by far and travel lots. Mike our tour guide/bus driver from galway tours was above and beyond also
place: Connemara Day Trip from Galway: Kylemore Abbey and Ross Errily Friary

title: outside rooms and a little spooky honestly but breakfast is fairly good and shuttle to airport awesome
text: outside rooms and a little spooky honestly but breakfast is fairly good and shuttle to airport awesome. I stayed going to Ireland and coming home cause my flight came in late...shuttle is wonderful and they let you leave your car also great but dark and remote outside rooms and bed isn't the best...average low end hotel room.

title: amazing beautiful place but do NOT stay here if you don't have a rental car...it is super hard to get a taxi
text: amazing beautiful place but do NOT stay here if you don't have a rental car...it is super hard to get a taxi and about 1.5 miles to the pier where you catch the ferry to Aran islands and the cliffs of moher walk and even to eat somewhere is 1 1/4 mile walk on a very narrow one lane road and pretty deserted. David is wonderful and makes a super breakfast but trans is just an issue and I didn't feel safe to drive on the other side of the car and road so was using train, bus, and walking. Better to stay on main street hotel doolin cottages etc.

title: ate here while staying at the state park there in sand springs....delicious
text: ate here while staying at the state park there in sand springs....delicious. The service was fun and good...food was just super good. I had fajitas and they were super and prices are very fair/low end of most restaurants.

title: amazing art
text: went here 2-16-19 and LOVED the statues, paintings and art it is so very unusual and just beautiful work...much talent in Eureka

title: a must when in eureka
text: this little park is downtown and during warm weather always has great music. Also so many little shops and snacky places

title: So quaint and unique
text: ate here Valentine's Saturday weekend and had a burger and fries..food is delicious and the atmosphere amazing. Unique

title: Loved everything about it but the neighbors above us....no sound barrier and very loud!
text: The owners are wonderful and so is this property but for $176 I really expected quiet and rest which we did NOT get. We were in the hummingbird suite and had people staying above us (Valentine's day weekend so they were full) and they came in about 11:30pm and woke us up...we laughed super loud and they got quiet. They was up about 6am the next morning walking around but obvious they were trying to be quiet you just can't at a 100 year old property with no insulation for sound proofing so my advice is stay here the breakfast and people are amazing but stay in a lower price above unit. Hope this helps many!!!

title: nice and clean...super friendly staff but no rest due to guest above stomping around, running water. Right on interstate
text: This hotel has a delicious breakfast included, friendly staff, clean big rooms, BUT it is right ON the interstate so lots of traffic noise and in the night I heard a train??? Also I was in a ground level room and the people above me kept me up past midnight and had me back up at 7am...wasn't many people staying there so WHY they put someone ABOVE me instead of a room or 2 down from me is silly and not using good sense. I would stay again but only on the top floor (2 levels)
place: Best Western Trail Dust Inn & Suites

title: Shannon was the nicest most helpful taco bell worker ever and food was delicious
text: I ate here 1-18-19 on a biz trip and there was an older lady wiping tables, visiting with guests, Shannon was kind to her employees (she's the mgr) and they were all working so great as a team. The food was fast, very fresh, and other people eating there were happy, friendly, visiting, and content with their food also...a GREAT taco bell location for sure!

title: Brandy and Naomi make this the BEST Arby's ever!!!
text: I ate here on my way home from a biz trip in sulphur springs TX and it was super clean, and Brandy and Naomi (and another man cleaning vents) was just above and beyond helpful and nice....best experience ever at an Arbys.

title: Wonderful 1 bedroom with a bath and a half and a HUGE jacuzzi tub
text: Stayed here 5 days and it was just wonderful...great staff. Even greater property and it has a 3 person (not kidding) jacuzzi in the bedroom in the 600 sq ft 1 bedroom and another bathroom with a walk in shower and a half bath in the bedroom..small living room with dining table and small kitchen but full size stove and everything you need. Great place to stay. Super location and very quiet.

title: this was a great show
text: loved this was lots of history and just a super fun show and the price was good for branson...really enjoyed it
place: Andy Williams Performing Arts Center & Theatre

title: LOVE this property....never disappointed with the condo or the service they provide
text: I stay here fairly often in a 1 bedroom and it is HUGE and wonderful. Every single employee is beyond helpful, kind, and want you to enjoy your stay. It is highly recommended and you have a 2 person jacuzzi right in your bedroom and a full kitchen so I cook most of our meals and save a fortune not eating out.
